1.name: Milo
1.description: Friendly, energetic, and loves cuddles. Milo will follow you around like a shadow!

2.name: Snowy
2.description: A calm, fluffy queen who loves warm sunspots and soft blankets.

3.name: Buddy
3.description: A loyal sweetheart who loves fetch, belly rubs, and literally everyone.

4.name: Luna
4.description: A majestic fluffball with big eyes and bigger attitude. Extremely photogenic.

5.name: Coco
5.description: Small, sassy, and adorable. Coco thinks she's 6 feet tall and runs the house.
